snippet: President Mahmoud Abbas of the Palestinian Authority expressed optimism that a peace agreement could be reached in the nine months allotted to the current round of talks.
abstract: Palestinian Authority Pres Mahmoud Abbas expresses optimism that a peace agreement could be reached in the nine months allotted to the current round of negotiations in a rare meeting with Israeli politicians; Abbas alos pointedly avoids questions that proved provocative in the past.
lead_paragraph: President Mahmoud Abbas of the Palestinian Authority expressed optimism that a peace agreement could be reached in the nine months allotted to the current round of talks.

headline.main: Meeting With Israelis, Palestinian Leader Strikes a Conciliatory Tone on Peace Talks
headline.print_headline: Meeting With Israelis, Palestinian Leader Strikes a Conciliatory Tone on Peace Talks
